Authors: Dennis E Desjardin, Brian Andrew Perry
Title:
The genus Pluteus (Basidiomycota, Agaricales, Pluteaceae)
from Republic of São Tomé and Príncipe, West Africa
Keywords:
pluteoid fungi, fungal diversity, mushrooms, Gulf of
Guinea, taxonomy
Abstract:
Six species of Pluteus are reported from the African
island nation, Republic of São Tomé and Príncipe. Two represent new
species (P. hirtellus, P. thomensis) and the other four represent new
distribution records. Comprehensive descriptions, line drawings, color
photographs, comparisons with allied taxa, a dichotomous key to aid
identification, and a phylogenetic analysis of pertinent Pluteus species
based on ITS rDNA sequences are provided.
